attributes.action: Have more accessible help to those with mental health issues.
attributes.additional_details: i just want people to get the help they need and deserve. There's an active petition about cats but not mental health? Sort it out guys!!
attributes.background: People shouldn't have to wait weeks for an appointment with a doctor or a psychiatrist if it's a mental health emergency. People dye from things like this everyday, it need to be stopped.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not exactly sure what you mean by "more accessible". 

If you want more funding for mental health services, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/202254 

If you want a maximum 30 day wait for anyone needing counselling for mental health issues, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/203809

Alternatively, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
